description: The Appalachian Ski Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Appalachian Ski for the snow report
Alexa, ask Appalachian Ski for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Appalachian Ski
shortDescription: The Appalachian Ski Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Appalachian Ski.
